Class BluetoothScanner

    public class BluetoothScanner
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver
implements IScanner
    Scans for V1's.

        Description copied from interface: IScanner

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        addy - The address to scan for.
        type - The type of the BluetoothDevice.
        Returns:

        Parameters:
        type - Connection type to scan. Note ConnectionType.Demo is not a valid scan type
        Returns:

      • isV1Connection

        public static final boolean isV1Connection(java.lang.String name)
        Helper method for determining if a BluetoothDevice is a V1.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the BluetoothDevices to scan if it a V1.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the BluetoothDevices is a V1.
